snippet.title: Joint Operations: Escalation
snippet.description:
Re-deploy for the next explosive chapter in the most chaotic & intense online military conflict of the 21st century! In Joint Operations: Escalation, soldiers can pound the enemy camp into submission with the deadly M1A1-Abrams tank or maneuver the Apache attack helicopter through artillery fire to obliterate bases below. Ride hell for leather on dirt bikes to protect neighboring bases from invading ground troops. Select from over 40 awesome weapons and multiple ammo types. Load a G-36 with soft points or a P-90 with armor piercing rounds. Bring down massive tanks with the formidable Javelin missile. Test your mettle against the best soldiers in the world across spectacular multiplayer levels online, including an abandoned strip mine, waterfall ruins, a chemical weapons factory, and more!
Note: Requires original game Joint Operations: Typhoon Rising
http://store.steampowered.com/app/32700/
